name: Paradigm Demo
description:
Paradigm is a Unity 2D adventure game worked on by myself and a group of friends. 

The game is set in a sci-fi post-apocalyptic world, and features melee and gunplay combat.

This demo contains some of the systems and mechanics originally planned for the project.

The game will feature weird bugs/visual glitches, since it is a demo. This is essentially the remains of a project that stalled due to workload and starting college.
